promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a massive rare beetle grass-type pokemon with white wings. It can be found in forest-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdancula, a a massive rare beetle grass-type pokemon. It can be found in forest-like environments It has the following abilities: Winter Horn. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "grass" or "Verdancula". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, beetle-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: Hidden among foliage, this jade titan thrives in sylvan environments. It's famed for its Winter Horn ability, skillfully fending off foes.
